instructions: Tap Settings . From the 'Networks' tab, tap More . Tap Mobile networks > Access Point Names . If available, tap the T-Mobile LTE APN (the bullet point fills with green). If not available, tap the Menu key, and then tap Add APN . A separate APN must be added manually for the Reset to default option to appear. Verify and update the following settings for the Data APN: Name: T-Mobile US LTE APN: fast.t-mobile.com Proxy: <Not set> Port: <Not set> Username: <Not set> Password: <Not set> Server: <Not set> MMSC: http://mms.msg.eng.t-mobile.com/mms/wapenc MMS proxy: <Not set> MMS port: <Not set> MMS protocol: WAP 2.0 MCC: 310 MNC: 260 Authentication type: <Not set> APN type: <Not set> OR Internet+MMS APN protocol: IPv4/IPv6 APN roaming protocol: IPv4 Enable/disable APN: <greyed out unless there are multiple APN's> Bearer: Unspecified Tap the desired APN profile you want to use. The bullet point fills with green next to the APN profile.

Tap Settings . From the 'Networks' tab, tap More . Tap Mobile networks > Network operators > Search networks . The phone searches for networks. This takes several minutes. Tap to select the desired network. The phone registers you on that network.

Tap Settings . From the 'Networks' tab, tap More . Tap Mobile networks > Mobile networks . Tap Network mode . Tap one of the following desired band settings: GSM / WCDMA / LTE (auto) (LTE setting) GSM / WCDMA (auto) WCDMA only GSM only (2G only setting)
Tap Settings . From the 'Networks' tab, tap the Airplane mode switch to turn it on or off. If prompted, review the Airplane mode message and then tap OK .

Tap Settings . From the 'Networks' tab, tap More . Tap Mobile data > Menu . Tap Mobile networks . Slide the Data roaming switch to turn it on or off. If prompted, review the Attention message and then tap Yes .
From any Home screen, tap Settings . Tap the Networks tab. Tap Mobile data > Menu . Tap Mobile networks . Slide the Mobile data switch to turn it on or off.
From the home screen, tap Phone . Tap the Menu icon at the top right. You may need to remove the Pen Pop icon to see it. Tap Call settings . Slide the VoLTE switch to turn it on or off.

Swipe left on the home screen to the Apps tray. Tap Settings . Tap Network & wireless . Tap Cellular & SIM . Tap SIM settings . Under Internet APN, tap Default APN > Apply to set to default. If no default is available, tap +Add an Internet APN and use the following settings: APN: fast.t-mobile.com User name: [blank] Password: [blank] Type of sign-in info: None IP type: IPv4v6XLAT Use this APN for LTE and replace the one from my mobile operator: [unchecked] Proxy server: [blank] Proxy port: [blank] To set up MMSC settings, tap Add MMS APN and and use the following settings: APN: fast.t-mobile.com User name: <Not set> Password: <Not set> Authentication type: <Not set> WAP gateway (URL): <Not set> WAP gateway port: <Not set> MMSC (URL): http://mms.msg.eng.t-mobile.com/mms/wapenc MMSC port: <Not set> Maximum MMS size: 1MB IP type: IPv4/IPv6 Tap Save .

Swipe left on the home screen to the Apps tray. Tap Settings . Tap Network & wireless . Tap Cellular & SIM . Tap SIM settings . Tap Search for networks. Wait while the device searches for networks. Tap the desired network from the drop-down box. Tap OK .

Swipe left on the home screen to the Apps tray. Tap Settings . Tap Network & wireless . Tap Cellular & SIM . Tap SIM settings . Tap the the Highest connection speed drop-down. Tap one of the following: LTE 4G 2G
Swipe left on the home screen to the Apps tray. Tap Settings . Tap Network & wireless . Tap Cellular & SIM . Tap SIM settings . Tap the switch to on or off.

Swipe left on the home screen to the Apps tray. Tap Settings . Tap Network & wireless . Tap Cellular & SIM . Tap SIM settings . Tap the Data roaming options drop-down. Tap one of the following: don't roam roam
Swipe left on the home screen to the Apps tray. Tap Settings . Tap Network & wireless . Tap Cellular & SIM . Tap SIM settings . Tap the Data connection switch to on or off.
Swipe left on the home screen to the Apps tray. Tap Settings . Tap Network & wireless . Tap Cellular & SIM . Tap SIM settings . Tap the IMS Registration switch to on or off.
